attributes.action: Allow NHS ambulance staff/students to sit C1 lessons/test
attributes.additional_details: Allow ambulance staff to take their C1 test so they can drive emergency ambulances and help in this pandemic
attributes.background: The ambulance service is a crucial service within the NHS and emergency services. Staff and students require a C1 to drive ambulances please let them take their tests.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Allow driving tests and lessons for Keyworkers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566844
